bill.title: Relating to discovery.
bill.description: Directs district attorney to calculate cost of creating and providing copies of discovery material to defendant with court-appointed counsel and to submit request for reimbursement to Oregon Department of Administrative Services. Directs district attorney to calculate cost of creating and providing copies of discovery material to defendant with court-appointed counsel and to submit request for reimbursement to Oregon Department of Administrative Services. Appropriates moneys to department for reimbursement of discovery costs.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Judiciary, then Ways and Means.
